name: vidown
description: /**  * Reencode audio & video without creating files first  *  * Requirements: ffmpeg, ether via a manual installation or via ffmpeg-static  *  * If you need more complex features like an output-stream you can check the older, more complex example:  * https://github.com/fent/node-ytdl-core/blob/cc6720f9387088d6253acc71c8a49000544d4d2a/example/ffmpeg.js  */
